nodes.text: This Czerka mining team used a sandcrawler to cross the Dune Sea led by a mining captain. Tusken Raiders attacked the sandcrawler, immobilizing it and sending multiple waves of Tuskens to finish the team off. However Revan intervened and defended the mining team. They left the sandcrawler in the desert for the Jawas to scavenge so they could buy it back from them.
